definition: a basketball shot in which the basketball is propelled downward into the basket, dip into a liquid while eating
details:
noun
- a basketball shot in which the basketball is propelled downward into the basket
= synonyms: dunk shot, stuff shot
verb
- dip into a liquid while eating
= example: dip into a liquid while eating
= synonyms: dip
- immerse briefly into a liquid so as to wet, coat, or saturate
= synonyms: souse, dip, plunge, douse
- make a dunk shot, in basketball
= example: make a dunk shot, in basketball
